title: Commission Directive 78/765/EEC of 7 September 1978 amending Directive 76/447/EEC relating to the triangular system of the outward processing procedure
header:
COMMISSION DIRECTIVE  of 7 September 1978  amending Directive 76/447/EEC relating to the triangular system of the outward processing procedure  (78/765/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
An Article 8a as follows is inserted in Directive 76/447/EEC:
"Article 8a
Member States concerned with a particular trade flow may conclude specific arrangements for information and control procedures other than those based on the use of the INF-2 sheet and offering equivalent guarantees.
Member States intending to conclude such an arrangement shall notify the draft thereof in advance to the Commission, which shall inform the other Member States.
The arrangement may be implemented if, within two months from the date of receipt of such draft, the Commission has not informed the Member States concerned that there are objections to its implementation."
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
